item.title: African Dream: Njeri Rionge in Kenya - BBC News
item.description:
African Dream: Njeri Rionge in Kenya - BBC News

Kenyan digital tycoon Njeri Rionge on embracing the dot.com age for Africa's economic boom

item.title: Meet Pioneer Internet Millionaire, Njeri Rionge - Ventures Africa
item.description:
Meet Pioneer Internet Millionaire, Njeri Rionge - Ventures Africa

not simply financial rewards" says the woman who turned a $500,000 startup business into East Africa's leading Internet Service Provider valued at $173 million. Njeri Rionge is described by Forbes as one of Kenya's most successful serial entrepreneurs and if increasing value is her definition of success, Ms Rionge is undoubtedly a serial success.

item.title: Njeri Rionge - The story of Kenya's untiring serial entrepreneur
item.description:
Njeri Rionge - The story of Kenya's untiring serial entrepreneur

Njeri Rionge is a serial entrepreneur and founder of Wananchi Online, East Africa's first mass market Internet Service Provider (ISP) which has grown to become the region's leading cable, broadband and internet-based phone company.

item.title: Cadillac - Njeri Rionge
item.description:
Cadillac - Njeri Rionge

The "Dare Greatly" campaign launched on the 2015 Academy Awards and celebrates the extraordinary people who dare to drive the world forward. This spot features African internet entrepreneur Njeri Rionge.

item.title: Dare Greatly
item.description:
Dare Greatly

I caught this commercial from Cadillac a few weeks back and it left me completely speechless! Not many commercials have left such an impression. See for yourself: This commercial is part of the 'Dare Greatly' campaign by Publicis for the 112 year old iconic brand Cadillac.

item.title: Red Carpet Branding: Cadillac Casts Iconoclasts for Dare Greatly Oscars Campaign
item.description:
Red Carpet Branding: Cadillac Casts Iconoclasts for Dare Greatly Oscars Campaign

Cadillac unveils its long-awaited new TV commercials during The Academy Awards telecast on ABC tonight, elaborating on its new "Dare Greatly" tagline and positioning that global chief marketing officer Uwe Ellinghaus previewed for brandchannel 's Dale Buss last week.

item.title: Njeri Rionge
item.description:
Njeri Rionge

I love the people, their originality and of course the opportunity for growth in Africa in general, and in East Africa in particular. You can do anything in Africa if you believe in what you are doing and you work hard. There is so much still to be done.

item.title: Welcome to Connected Growth at NRBC Inc.
item.description:
Welcome to Connected Growth at NRBC Inc.

NRBC Inc. Matching Investment Capital and Entrepreneurs.

item.title: Njeri Rionge
item.description:
Njeri Rionge

Described by Forbes as 'One of Africa's most successful serial entrepreneurs', Njeri Rionge has over Two decades of leadership experience working with both start-ups and large corporations. She is the President & CEO of NRBC Inc., a business advisory and financial services firm run by entrepreneurs and expert partners focused on African investment opportunities.
